spells.name: Aspect of the Stag
spells.description: +2 AC against attacks of opportunity and increases speed.

spells.name: Bloody Claws
spells.description: Gives creature the ability to deal bleed damage with natural attacks.

spells.name: Cloak of Winds
spells.description: Creates a whirling screen of strong wind around you.

spells.name: Feather Step, Mass
spells.description: As feather step, but affects many targets rather than one.

spells.name: Instant Enemy
spells.description: Target is treated as a favored enemy type of your choice.

spells.name: Life Bubble
spells.description: Protects creatures from sustained environmental effects.

spells.name: Strong Jaw
spells.description: Natural attacks damage as two sizes bigger.

spells.name: Tireless Pursuers
spells.description: As tireless pursuit, but affects many targets rather than one.
